Crystal Heart

miscellaneous (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 346
restriction [cannotwear]: cannot be worn by inanimate units
extra life [extralife]: 1
(unremovable [cursed], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], communion-master [commaster], applies-chest-wound [chestwound])

Requires 10E10S to forge (E2S2)

The Crystal Heart is a heart-shaped crystal placed in the chest of its owner behind his ordinary heart. If the owner later dies, the crystal will release its energies and restore the owner to full health. The crude surgery used when embedding the heart will most likely permanently damage its owner. One being can have multiple magic hearts at once. Inanimate beings cannot use magic hearts.
